metadata.title: CVE-2024-6608 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: It was possible to move the cursor using pointerlock from an iframe. Thisallowed moving the cursor outside of the viewport and the Firefox window.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 128 and Thunderbird < 128.

criterions.comment: mozjs78: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
